itunes:title: Deuteronomy Week 2 with Tasha Calvert
title: Deuteronomy Week 2 with Tasha Calvert
description:
For the second week of our Deuteronomy study, Raechel and Amanda continue to read with author, speaker, and Bible teacher, Tasha Calvert. They discuss ancient festivals, the practice of giving, worship that reflects God’s heart for justice, and encouraging each other in the Word—and how these are all acts of obedience in response to what God has already done. Listen along as we remember the God who sets Himself apart as holy, yet chooses to dwell with His people.  


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth Deuteronomy reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Deuteronomy collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/deuteronomy-week-2-with-tasha-calvert
